list_definition.definition: having an even surface; not rough

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Her skin is as smooth as satin.
Mix the ingredients to a smooth paste.

list_definition.definition: (of movement) without breaks, stops or jolts

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Did you have a smooth flight from New York?
His progress towards promotion was smooth and rapid.

list_definition.definition: (too) agreeable and pleasant in manner etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I don’t trust those smooth salesmen.

list_definition.definition: (often with down, out etc) to make (something) smooth or flat

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She tried to smooth the creases out.

list_definition.definition: (with intoor over) to rub (a liquid substance etc) gently over (a surface)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Smooth the moisturizing cream into/over your face and neck.
